actions.recommendation: Your haemoglobin levels are slightly decreased, please see your GP to investigate reasons why this may be so.
Your Vit D is suboptimal. Please supplement with 5000iu daily and repeat levels in 3/12
Annual mammograms, pap smears are important to keep up with - try your best to do so.
Exercise will improve your risk for chronic illness, help reduce weight and also decrease stress and anxiety. 3x30-40mins a week recommended.
High-sensitivity C-reactive protein (hsCRP) is a marker of inflammation that predicts incident heart attacks, stroke and arterial disease. A level lower than 1 is ideal.
